overview: Gia Paloma stars as The Animal, a woman with a ferocious appetite for rough, kinky, degrading sex! She starts by taking on three bored clowns after their show, including lots of rough sex, spitroasting, anal, and a triple facial. Next, Gia goes to the bank with her dwarf sidekick Diablo to get a loan, but she's soon got the three bank managers and a teller in the office for a fierce anal orgy. Later, Gia is hitchhiking and gets picked up by a cowboy, and thanks him for the ride by offering every hole she has. Finally caged, Gia entices Chris Evans into the cage with a rough and wild anal ride!
title: The Animal
